text: (4 April 2004 – 1 April 2019) was a Japanese Thoroughbred racemare which won the 2007 Group One (GI) Tokyo Yūshun (Japanese Derby). She won seven G1 races in Japan and was the highest earning racemare in Thoroughbred history at the time."Vodka pursuing all-time earnings record in Dubai". Thoroughbred Times, February 26, 2010 Retrieved 2012-02-10. Vodka died on 1 April 2019, from laminitis in Newmarket, Suffolk.名牝ウオッカ死亡 谷水オーナー、角居調教師、武豊騎手、四位騎手のコメント netkeiba.com She was 14. ==References== Category:2004 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Thoroughbred racehorses
title: Vodka (horse)
